department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences
department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系

goal.en: This course hopes to arouse students‘ interest in quantitative research and will focus on practicality. The course objectives are as follows: First, this course will introduce the basic concepts of quantitative research in a simple way, excluding complex formula calculations. It is hoped that the students in the course can understand the meaning behind the data, use statistical methods and correctly interpret the analysis results. Second, by understanding the basic concepts of quantitative research and the actual operation of computer statistical software, students are guided to use quantitative research methods to explore various important issues of social science, and to objectively analyze political, social and economic phenomena.
goal.ch: 本課程希望能引起學生對統計的興趣，會以實用為主。課程目標如下:第一，本課程將用深入淺出的方式介紹量化研究的基本概念，排除複雜的公式計算，希望修課同學能了解數據資料背後的意義，運用統計方法及正確詮釋分析結果。第二，藉由了解量化研究的基本概念，以及實際電腦統計軟體操作，引導同學使用量化研究方法探究社會科學關心的各種重要議題，客觀分析政治、社會以及經濟等現象。

content.en:
Week 1 (2/22):Course introduction
Week 2 (2/29):Quantitative research methods and basic Concepts of Statistics
Week 3 (3/7):Data collection, measurement, and introduction to academic database
Week 4 (3/14):Hypothesis test and Basic operation of statistical software SPSS (1)
Week 5 (3/21):Basic operation of statistical software SPSS (2)
Week 6 (3/28):Basic operation of statistical software SPSS (3)
Week 7 (4/4):Children‘s Day Holiday
Week 8 (4/11):Midterm Group Presentation
Week 9 (4/18):Related analysis and statistical software operation
Week 10 (4/25):Independent sample t test and statistical software operation
Week 11 (5/2):Variance analysis and statistical software operation
Week 12 (5/9):Chi-square verification and statistical software operation
Week 13 (5/16):Regression analysis and statistical software operation
Week 14 (5/23):Binary Categorical Variable Regression Analysis and Statistical Software Operation
Week 15 (5/30):Expert speech
Week 16 (6/6):Final Report Presentation
Week 17 (6/13):Teacher Flexible Teaching Week
Week 18 (6/20):Teacher Flexible Teaching Week
* Please refer to the detailed content provided in the syllabus distributed during the first class.
content.ch:
Week 1 (2/22):課程介紹
Week 2 (2/29):量化研究方法與統計基本概念
Week 3 (3/7):資料蒐集衡量、學術資料庫介紹、統計圖表的呈現
Week 4 (3/14):假設檢定、統計軟體SPSS基本操作(一)
Week 5 (3/21):統計軟體SPSS基本操作(二)
Week 6 (3/28):統計軟體SPSS基本操作(三)
Week 7 (4/4):兒童節放假
Week 8 (4/11):期中分組報告
Week 9 (4/18):相關分析與統計軟體操作
Week 10 (4/25):獨立樣本t檢定與統計軟體操作
Week 11 (5/2):變異數分析與統計軟體操作
Week 12 (5/9):卡方檢定與統計軟體操作
Week 13 (5/16):迴歸分析與統計軟體操作
Week 14 (5/23):二元類別變項的迴歸分析與統計軟體操作
Week 15 (5/30):專家演講(暫定)
Week 16 (6/6):期末成果發表會
Week 17 (6/13):教師彈性教學週
Week 18 (6/20):教師彈性教學週
*詳細內容請見第一堂發的授課大綱

textbook.en: 一、 Designated textbooks:1. Yan Zhilong, Zheng Zhongping, 2019, “A Statistical Guide for Authors of Papers: A fool can also run statistics“ (third edition). Taipei: Wunan Publishing House.二、Bibliography:1. Lin Huiling and Chen Zhengcang, 2020, “Modern Statistics“ (Second Edition), Taipei: Shuangye Bookstore.2. Neil J. Salkind, translated by Zhuang Wenzhong and Zheng Tianze, 2017, “Fall in Love with Statistics“ (Fourth Edition), Taipei: Wunan Press.3. Luo Qingjun, 2016, “Social Science Research Method: Open the Skylight and Talk about Quantification“ (third edition), New Taipei City: Yangzhi Culture.4. Qiu Haozheng, 2010, “Quantitative Research and Statistical Analysis: Analysis of SPSS (PASW) Data Analysis Examples“ (Fifth Edition), Taipei: Wunan Press.三、Teaching materials compiled by teachers
textbook.ch: 一、指定教科書:1.顏志龍、鄭中平，2019，《給論文寫作者的統計指南：傻瓜也會跑統計》（第三版）。台北：五南出版社。二、參考書目:1.林惠玲、陳正倉，2020，《現代統計學》（第二版），台北:雙葉書廊。2.Neil J. Salkind著，莊文忠、鄭天澤譯，2017，《愛上統計學》（第四版），台北:五南出版社。3.羅清俊，2016，《社會科學研究方法：打開天窗說量化》（第三版），新北市:揚智文化。4.邱皓政，2010，《量化研究與統計分析：SPSS(PASW)資料分析範例解析》(第五版)，台北：五南出版社。三、教師自編教材

grading.en: 1. Participation in classroom presentation and practice: 20％. 2. Class report by group: 20％ 3. Interim report by group: 30％. 4. Final report by group: 30％.
grading.ch: 1.課堂發言討論與課堂實作參與:20％ 2.分組課堂報告:20％ 3.分組期中報告:30％ 4.分組期末報告:30％
